Question: In 1999, this person was listed in Gallup's Most Widely Admired People of the 20th century.
Hints: Her birthday on June 27 is commemorated as this person Day in the U.S.
Helen Adams **** (June 27, 1880 – June 1, 1968) was an American author, political activist, and lecturer.
The Bollywood movie Black (2005) was largely based on this person's story, from her childhood to her graduation.
